    • メソッドの詳細

      • rotate

        XY rotate(double theta)
        パラメータ:
        theta - [rad]
        戻り値:
        XY rotated by theta counter-clockwisely

      • getInnerProduct

        double getInnerProduct(XY xy)
        パラメータ:
        xy - target
        戻り値:
        xyとの内積 inner product with the xy

      • getR

        double getR()
        戻り値:
        distance from the origin (0,0)

      • cross

        static double cross(Point2D point1,
                    Point2D point2)
        パラメータ:
        point1 - point
        point2 - point
        戻り値:
        value of cross point1 * point2

      • ccw

        static double ccw(Point2D p1,
                  Point2D p2,
                  Point2D p3)
        counter clock wise the line is p1 → p2 → p3
        パラメータ:
        p1 - point
        p2 - point
        p3 - point
        戻り値:
        0: straight, positive: counter clock, negative: clockwise

        static double dotProduct(Point2D point1,
                         Point2D point2)
